fields.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
fields.author: Harper Lee
fields.description: To Kill a Mockingbird (1960) by Harper Lee is a Pulitzer Prize-winning Southern Gothic novel set in 1930s Alabama, exploring racial injustice and the loss of innocence through the eyes of young Scout Finch
